privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit Bubble Shooters.

intro.text1: It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website.
intro.text2: respects your privacy and is committed to protecting any information you may provide us through this website.
intro.text3: This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances we may disclose it to third parties. This Privacy Policy applies to

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: Our website does not require user registration or login. We do not collect any personally identifiable information from our users. The only data we collect are:
items: Browser cookies essential for website functionality
Anonymous usage statistics to improve our service

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdParty.description: The games and related content available on our website are sourced from third-party platforms. We do not claim ownership of this content and:
items: All games are hosted on and streamed from third-party services
Game information, images, and descriptions are provided by third-party sources
We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or availability of this content

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. These cookies are:
items: Essential for basic website functionality
Used to remember your display preferences
Not used for tracking or advertising purposes
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

links.title: External Links
links.description: Our website contains links to external sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service of every site you visit.
links.disclaimer: We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites, products, or services.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
updates.consent: Your continued use of our website after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
